Have you ever dreamed of a resort that remains unspoiled, quiet and as some say as Turkey used to be', then think of Akbuk.
Ever wanted to stay in quality holiday accommodation that again offers peace, a place to chill, large pool, and breath-taking views, then think of A Touch of Paradise Resort.
Akbuk means White Bay and is just a 30 minute drive away from the popular resort of Didim/Altinkum. The village has a great location on one side a 10 mile bay with many clean, safe beaches, to the other forests alive with pine trees.
Akbuk is just 70km from Bodrum Airport and 140km from Izmir. There is a great harbour in the village with bars, restaurants and market stalls, try the weekly market!
Do not expect a great deal of nightlife, as you will search hard to find a disco but what you will find is great food, terrific atmosphere and very friendly people.
